quote: Today there could be laughter and freedom, but soon the magic would end and they would have to go back to the real world. However, there would still always be time to get under Dak's skin.
quote_letters: TODAY THERE COULD BE LAUGHTER AND FREEDOM BUT SOON THE MAGIC WOULD END AND THEY WOULD HAVE TO GO BACK TO THE REAL WORLD HOWEVER THERE WOULD STILL ALWAYS BE TIME TO GET UNDER DAKS SKIN
